resources.string:
" -WELCOME TO EQUATIONS SOLVER- 

 				 please choose one of 
				these equations to solve
\ 1. one variable first order 

 'aX+b=r'
 2. one variable second order 

 'a(X^2)+bX+c=r'
 3. two equations(vars) first order 

 'aX+bY=r1 & cX+dY=r2'
 4. decimal to binary or vice versa 

"
we deal with equation in this form : a(X^2)+bX+c=r
\t\twelcome to solver, \n\t\t your operations history will show here !\n
decimal to binary or vice versa
we deal with equation in this form : aX+b=r

we deal with equations in this form :
 aX+bY=r1
 cX+dY=r2
decimal number to binary or vice versa
